text: The Ministry of Transport () is a government ministry of Gabon, headquartered in the Immeuble Interministériel (Interministerial Building) in Libreville."mentions légales" (Archive). Ministry of Transport. Retrieved on 25 March 2015. "Place de la Mosquée HASSAN II Immeuble Interministériel BP : 2087 Libreville / Gabon" As of 2015 the current minister is Paulette Megue M'Owono."Accueil" (Archive). Ministry of Transport. Retrieved on March 25, 2015. The Bureau d'Enquêtes Incidents et Accidents d'Aviation (BEIAA), Gabon's civil aviation accident agency, is an agency of the ministry. It was created by Decree No. 00804 of 19 October 2009. "Décret no 01108" (Archive). Ministry of Transport. Retrieved on March 25, 2015. ==See also== * Agence Nationale de l'Aviation Civil ==References== ==External links== * Ministry of Transport * "Gabon : le Ministère des Transports paralysé par une grève illimitée" (Archive). Gabon Libre. Friday 12 July 2013. title: Ministry of Transport (Gabon)
